plugins.name: Radial & Angular Blur FX
plugins.description:
Radial & Spin Blur is a professional Figma plugin that lets you add cinematic zoom or spin blurs in seconds while keeping full creative control.


Radial Blur (Zoom). Simulates rushing toward/away from a point (motion graphics, depth focus).

Spin Blur (Angular). Rotates pixels around a center (energetic, surreal visuals).

Anaglyph 3D (optional). Adds subtle red/cyan offset (retro depth accents).


Key features

  1. Live Preview – Resizable preview area shows the effect before you commit.
  2. 5 × 5 Focal-Point Grid – Pick any corner, edge, or true center.
  3. Smooth Intensity Slider – From whisper-soft haze to dramatic streaks.
  4. Large-Image Support – Works on layers / frames up to 1000 px with smart scaling.
  5. No Clipping – Padding logic prevents cut-offs even at high values or off-center points.
  6. One-Click Apply – Happy with the look? Hit Apply and you’re done.
  7. Modern UI – Fast, accessible, dark-mode aware.
  8. Usage Analytics – Pseudonymous event data is sent to Amplitude to improve performance and roadmap decisions (no personal identifiers are collected).


Typical workflow

  1. Select a layer or frame (≤ 1000 px).
  2. Pick Radial (Zoom) or Spin (Angular).
  3. Set the center on the 5×5 grid and adjust intensity.
  4. Preview the result live.
  5. Apply the blur — undo-friendly and non-destructive.


Perfect for

UI/UX designers, illustrators, social-media creators, or anyone who wants studio-grade motion blurs inside Figma.


Built with TypeScript, Figma Plugin API, and Amplitude telemetry for anonymous usage insights.


Help

Tweet/X me @antongridz for feedback and help.

accepted.name: Anton Gridz
accepted.description: I'm a product designer with 13+ years of experience building tools for startups and growing teams.

plugins.tagline: Zoom- or spin-style blur with live preview, 5×5 focal grid, anaglyph toggle, and one-click apply.

plugins.name: Bulk Banner
plugins.description:
Streamline Ad Campaign Production


Transform your Figma frames into animated banner ads instantly.

Perfect for Google Ads, Criteo, AdRoll, and more!

Key Features:


  1. Batch create GIFs or HTML5 ads from Figma frames
  2. Intuitive naming system for easy customization
  3. Automate duration and loop settings
  4. Organize outputs into folders automatically


Save hours on repetitive tasks. Ideal for advertising pros handling multiple campaigns.

plugins.name: Documentation Link Bulk Edit
plugins.description:
Maintaining your design system has now become easier with the assistance of this super handy plugin. No longer do you need to edit the documentation link for each component individually.


Instructions

  • Select all the components or components sets you wish to edit the documentation link.
  • Paste the documentation link and click ”Update Link”.
  • If you wish to clear/remove the documentation links, simply leave the input field empty and click ”Update Link”.
  • Ensure you only select main components or component sets; component instances won't work.


How to reach out and support

Please send comments and suggestions to rodrigodaudskeff@gmail.com or simply post a comment here.
plugins.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

How to reach out and support

Please send comments and suggestions to rodrigodaudskeff@gmail.com or simply post a comment here.
72428.release_notes: Fixed the issue of removing the documentation link for multiple components inside a component set.
72428.tagline: Easily edit the documentation link of multiple components with a single click.

plugins.name: Fest (Component Test Kit)
plugins.description:
Introducing Fest: Your Ultimate Testing Companion!


Revolutionize your component testing with Fest's seamless three-step process – evaluating layouts, text properties, and property variations.


Fest instantly generates multiple instances of varying sizes, character lengths, and all possible property combination for your components and component sets (aka variants). Testing has never been this intuitive and efficient – try Fest now!
plugins.tagline: Test your components with confidence, minus the grunt work.

plugins.name: BlockFlow
plugins.description:
BlockFlow is a Figma plugin that allows you to easily convert your designs into WordPress blocks. This plugin is designed to simplify the process of transforming your visual projects into functional WordPress code. The exported blocks do not contain inline styles and rely solely on the logical attributes of the supported blocks.


Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground


Usage

  1. Select the design elements you want to convert into WordPress blocks
  2. Open the BlockFlow plugin from the Figma toolbar
  3. Click the "Convert to blocks" button in the plugin interface
  4. The plugin will automatically convert the selected elements into WordPress blocks
  5. Once the conversion is complete, the HTML code of the blocks will be copied to your clipboard
  6. Paste the copied code into your WordPress editor or HTML file


Supported blocks


  1. Group
  2. Separator
  3. Image
  4. Buttons
  5. Paragraph
  6. Headings
  7. Cover
  8. Columns
  9. List
  10. Media & Text
  11. Blockquote
  12. Pullquote
  13. Details
  14. Icon block - third party plugin
  15. Advanced Columns – third party plugin


Tips for optimal use


  1. Follow instructions on the Playground file https://www.figma.com/community/file/1414876266658754316/blockflow-playground
  2. Organize your Figma design logically, grouping related elements using the auto-layout feature when necessary.
  3. If you need to create a list, you can use a group by naming the block list and the child elements list-item.
  4. A list can also be created by applying the text list style and naming the element list.
  5. The aspect ratio from rectangles with an image layer will be automatically extracted and adjusted to the closest WordPress predefined default ratio.
  6. The list item block in WordPress only supports text, so any other element in your list group will not be exported.
  7. Configure the layout size in the advanced settings panel according to your theme settings.


Note

In this early experimental phase, the plugin does not provide controls to define or import the information found in the theme.json file.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma design to WordPress Blocks

plugins.name: DLTA
plugins.description:
The Delta Wireframe Converter plugin for Figma revolutionizes the design workflow by enabling the conversion of static wireframes, HTML, and CSS into dynamic Figma layers. Created by DLTA, this innovative tool enhances collaboration between designers and developers, ensuring consistency and precision in your design projects.

Key Features and Functionality:

Wireframe to Figma Conversion:

Automatically transform your static wireframes into interactive Figma layers.

Retain the original layout and structure for a seamless design transition.

HTML Integration:

Import HTML files directly into Figma, converting code into fully functional design layers.

Preserve the integrity of web designs, making manual adjustments unnecessary.

Secure Authorization:

Safely authorize access to DLTA’s services, ensuring your data remains protected.

Manage permissions effectively to maintain the security of your projects.
plugins.tagline: Convert wireframes, HTML, and CSS into interactive Figma layers seamlessly.

plugins.name: DSekon Auto Arrange
plugins.description:
The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.


  1.  Launch the plugin. The UI panel opens.
  2. Select a bunch of items.
  3. Use button “+” to create an adaptive auto layout.
  4. Change the frame width.
  5. The elements will be rearranged automatically (The elements will also be rebuilt when the elements inside the frame are changed, except for deletion).


IMPORTANT: To automatically rearranged the elements, the UI panel must be open.


The plugin has the ability to sort the elements inside the frame in alphabetical order.


DSekon.com

Donate
plugins.tagline: The plugin moves the elements to the next line AUTOMATICALLY.

plugins.name: Google Sheets & EasyContent Sync
plugins.description:
Tired of using “Lorem Ipsum” and generic images and then realizing that the text doesn’t fit or the image aspect ratio is different? Why not use your REAL content?


NEW: Introduced free Figma - Google Sheets integration


Watch the overview video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uuEsBKcnNp8


Say goodbye to placeholder text and Lorem Ipsum! The EasyContent plugin bridges the gap between your content and your design team by bringing your actual website content directly into Figma. Enhance your workflow, improve collaboration, and create designs that truly reflect the final product.


Why Use the EasyContent Plugin?

Designing with fake content can lead to broken experiences and costly revisions. With EasyContent, you can:

  1. Enhance Collaboration: Align your design and content teams by working with real content.
  2. Improve UX: Stress-test your designs with actual content to ensure they work in all scenarios.
  3. Impress Stakeholders: Present realistic mockups that accurately reflect the final product.


Key Features

  1. Direct Integration with EasyContent.io: Securely connect your EasyContent projects to Figma.
  2. Drag and Drop Content Fields: Easily insert text and images from your content projects into your designs.
  3. Content Swapping: Swap between different content items to test layouts and stress-test designs.
  4. Real-Time Updates: Keep your designs up-to-date with the latest content from your projects.
  5. Support for Text and Images: Currently supports single-line text, multi-line text, rich text, and images.


Who Is This Plugin For?

  1. Marketing and Web Design Agencies: Streamline your workflow by integrating content and design tools.
  2. Design Teams: Collaborate effectively with content creators and ensure designs are content-ready.
  3. Content Creators: Visualize how content will appear in the final design and provide feedback.


Getting Started

  1. Install the Plugin: Download the EasyContent plugin from the Figma Marketplace.
  2. Connect Your Account: Enter your EasyContent API key to securely connect your projects. If you don’t have an account, create it here: https://easycontent.io/
  3. Select a Project and Template: Choose the content you want to work with.
  4. Drag and Drop Content: Insert content fields directly into your design.


Future Developments

We're continuously improving the EasyContent plugin. Upcoming features include support for additional content types like checkboxes, radio buttons, selects, and dates.


Need Help or Have Suggestions?

We're here to support you. If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@easycontent.io.


Transform Your Design Process Today

Elevate your designs by integrating real content directly from EasyContent. Install the EasyContent plugin now and experience a more efficient, collaborative, and realistic design process!
plugins.tagline: Design with real content, not placeholders. Bridge the gap between your content and design teams!

plugins.name: Relinky - Scan and Replace Missing Tokens
plugins.description:
Relinky - Scan and Replace Missing Token


A powerful Figma plugin to help you find and manage unlinked design tokens and styles across your files. Inspired from other plugins like Similayer / Token studio


🔍 Scan all unlinked values

- Typography: Find text layers missing text style variables

- Spacing: Detect auto-layout frames with unlinked spacing

- Corner Radius: Identify shapes with unlinked corner radius

- Fill Colors: Find layers with unlinked fill colors

- Stroke Colors: Detect layers with unlinked stroke colors


🎯 Smart Selection

  1. Scan entire page or selected frames/components
  2. Group similar unlinked values for easy selection
  3. Quick selection of affected layers
  4. Navigate to specific instances


Working with Results

  1. Results are grouped by type and value for easier management
  2. Click on any result to select the affected layers in your design
  3. Replace and update missing tokens and links!
  4. Use the navigation arrows to jump between instances
  5. Apply suggested styles directly from the results panel


Tips

  1. Use the grouped results to quickly standardize similar unlinked values
  2. Regular scanning helps maintain design system consistency
  3. Consider scanning before sharing designs or creating documentation

accepted.name: Ivan Yeo
accepted.description: Design system | Product designer | Badminton Lover

plugins.tagline: Scan and replace unlinked values

manifest.name: Relinky - Scan and Replace Missing Tokens

136762.release_notes:
Stable V2.0.2

- Improved and add new options to select what you want to scan for. 
- Added Layout selection
- Added Opacity selection
- Added Effects selection
- Removed Live mode

BETA in V2.0.2
- You can now scan to pickup tokens and variables that are deleted from the file. select the scans and replace them with your new tokens!

Known Issues
- Deleted Variables would not filter font/typography tokens properly and some font tokens will sit under "others"
- No results showing when selecting a frame. Consider selection the nest frame of the screen you want to scan for.

Thank you for supporting! Feel free to give me feedback to improve on this plugin.

plugins.name: Styles cloner
plugins.description:
If you need to reuse local styles from one file to another, Styles clone is here to help!


Whether you start new project or continue iterating on existing one, now you can easily update your local styles library with new tailored items.

Plugin supports all style types with unlimited nesting levels:

  1. 🔤 Text styles
  2. 🎨 Color styles
  3. 🥅 Grid styles
  4. 🖌️ Effect styles


How it works?

  1. Open Style cloner plugin in one Figma Design file
  2. Copy Styles to clipboard with the button in Get Styles section
  3. Open Style cloner in Design file you are working with
  4. Paste config in Paste styles section and click Paste button
  5. You're all set! 🕺


For those who want to a clean slate, use Delete styles option. It is self explanatory and works with no surprises.


This is not my first plugin so I pay attention to errors handling. You will be notified if something goes wrong with Figma's native toasts. Control and comfort is the first priority. Stay tuned for future updates.


If you like plugin please click like, save and leave a comment! Appreciate it!

Support: kolebaev.build@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Copy text, color, effetc and grid styles between files in a blink of an eye

117141.name: Styles cloner
117141.description:
If you need to reuse local styles from one file to another, Styles clone is here to help!


Whether you start new project or continue iterating on existing one, now you can easily update your local styles library with new tailored items.

Plugin supports all style types with unlimited nesting levels:

  1. 🔤 Text styles
  2. 🎨 Color styles
  3. 🥅 Grid styles
  4. 🖌️ Effect styles


How it works?

  1. Open Style cloner plugin in one Figma Design file
  2. Copy Styles to clipboard with the button in Get Styles section
  3. Open Style cloner in Design file you are working with
  4. Paste config in Paste styles section and click Paste button
  5. You're all set! 🕺


For those who want to a clean slate, use Delete styles option. It is self explanatory and works with no surprises.


This is not my first plugin so I pay attention to errors handling. You will be notified if something goes wrong with Figma's native toasts. Control and comfort is the first priority. Stay tuned for future updates.


If you like plugin please click like, save and leave a comment! Appreciate it!

Support: kolebaev.build@gmail.com
117141.tagline: Copy text, color, effetc and grid styles between files in a blink of an eye

plugins.name: Dotsss Annotation Plugin
plugins.description:
Dotsss is a powerful annotation tool designed to streamline competitor research, benchmarking, and design collaboration. With auto-numbered dots that dynamically reorder when added or removed, you can maintain clarity in feedback, specs, and moodboards.


Key Features:

✅ Groups: Create separate dot groups per page or project—each with its own numbering sequence, color, size, and custom name.

✅ Dynamic Numbering: Add or remove dots in any group, and watch numbers auto-update instantly.

✅ Customizable Styles: Tailor each group’s appearance (color/size) to categorize feedback, highlight priorities, or match brand guidelines.

✅ Use Cases: Ideal for annotating competitor UIs, tracking design iterations, marking product specs, or organizing moodboard elements.
plugins.tagline: Annotate with smart dots that reorder as you edit. Organize by group, color, or project. 🎨🔢

123550.name: Dotsss Annotation Plugin
123550.description:

✅ Customizable Styles: Tailor each group’s appearance (color/size) to categorize feedback, highlight priorities, or match brand guidelines.

✅ Use Cases: Ideal for annotating competitor UIs, tracking design iterations, marking product specs, or organizing moodboard elements.

plugins.name: JSON to Text Fill
plugins.description:
Imagine you need to create a table with 10 rows and 10 columns. What if, instead of manually replacing text for 100 layers, you could use ChatGPT to generate random, "real life" looking data and use our plugin to fill all selected text layers with the newly generated text?


Imagine no more. Simply generate your JSOn using ChatGPT (see prompt examples here), select the text layers you want to replace in Figma, and fire up our plugin.


Current limitations:


  1. Layers will be filled according to Figma layering. If you don't get the right order, try re-ordering the Figma layers and repeat the process.
  2. Comma-separated values and complex JSON structured currently not accepted
plugins.tagline: Replace text layers with any text content in JSON format

85276.name: JSON to Text Fill
85276.description:
Imagine you need to create a table with 10 rows and 10 columns. What if, instead of manually replacing text for 100 layers, you could use ChatGPT to generate random, "real life" looking data and use our plugin to fill all selected text layers with the newly generated text?

  2. Comma-separated values and complex JSON structured currently not accepted

plugins.name: Color Harmony
plugins.description:
Explore the perfect color combinations. Pick the first hex code, and find other pleasing colors on the color wheel.


Color Harmonies

  1. Analogous
  2. Complementary
  3. Split Complementary
  4. Triadic
  5. Tetradic
  6. Compound
  7. Square


Color Variations

  1. Shades
  2. Tints
  3. Monochromatic
  4. Tones
  5. Hues


Features

  1. Select an object in your Figma project to load its color.
  2. Press "Update" to set it as the Current Color.
  3. Hover over the result colors to view their hex codes, and click to copy a color.
  4. In Settings, enable "Click color to fill" to fill the selected object with a result color.
plugins.tagline: Explore Harmonious Colors and Variations on the color wheel.

plugins.name: Text node name to id
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

7903.name: Text node name to id
7903.description:
This plugin lets you append the id of all the selected text nodes to their names. The format will then be: 'TextNode<node-id=node.id>'. This action is reversible.
The plugin also lets you export the selected text nodes to your clipboard. If you choose 'Advanced export', you can add any prefix to your node ids. The export action will copy the node ids in an YAML format. It will also add the color, font style, and text decoration to the node.characters. The resulted text will be easily usable in html files. The plugin also formats multiline texts.

plugins.name: PSD Importer for Figma
plugins.description:
Import your PSD files directly into Figma. It preserves the design elements such as layer structure, text properties, and complex styles, offering a smooth transition from Photoshop to Figma.


There are 2 import methods.

  1. Import all layers with maximum compatibility.
  2. Import each layer is bitmap image.


While the plugin strives for high accuracy, some discrepancies may occur due to differences between Photoshop and Figma’s rendering engines - particularly with complex effects, blending modes, and certain layer styles. In cases where features can’t be translated, some layers may be imported as images.


Users can try the plugin with three free PSD imports, after which unlimited access is available through an $8/month subscription.
plugins.tagline: Easily import your PSD files in just a few clicks.

133175.name: PSD Importer for Figma
133175.description:

There are 2 import methods.

  1. Import all layers with maximum compatibility.
  2. Import each layer is bitmap image.


While the plugin strives for high accuracy, some discrepancies may occur due to differences between Photoshop and Figma’s rendering engines - particularly with complex effects, blending modes, and certain layer styles. In cases where features can’t be translated, some layers may be imported as images.


Users can try the plugin with three free PSD imports, after which unlimited access is available through an $8/month subscription.

plugins.name: Gradient Magic
plugins.description:
Gradient Magic helps you enhance your designs by refining gradient transitions with ease. Simply select a layer, and Gradient Magic ensures smooth and visually appealing gradients. Say goodbye to harsh color shifts and enjoy seamless transitions. Whether you’re perfecting a landing page, building a complex design system, or crafting mobile UI, Gradient Magic makes your gradients look polished with minimal effort.

plugins.name: OKLCH Color Ramp
plugins.description:
Overview

The OKLCH Color Ramp Generator is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help designers create beautiful, perceptually uniform color scales using the OKLCH color space. This innovative tool addresses the common challenge of creating consistent and visually pleasing color ramps in design systems.


Key Features


1. Advanced Color Space Implementation

- Utilizes the OKLCH color space, which offers superior color interpolation compared to traditional RGB or HSL

- Ensures perceptually uniform steps between colors, making the resulting ramps more visually harmonious

- Provides more accurate color relationships, especially important for accessibility and design system consistency


2. User-Friendly Interface

- Simple and intuitive input system for base colors

- Customizable number of steps in the color ramp (default: 12)

- One-click generation of complete color scales


3. Smart Layout and Organization

- Automatically arranges color swatches in a horizontal layout

- Includes color information display (hex codes and intended OKLCH values)

- Automatic selection and zoom to the generated color ramp

- Clean, organized presentation of color information


Benefits for Designers


1. Time Efficiency

- Rapid generation of color scales

- Eliminates manual color interpolation

- Reduces the chance of errors in color calculations


2. Design Quality

- Ensures consistent visual steps between colors

- Creates more accessible color combinations

- Maintains color harmony across the design system


3. Workflow Integration

- Seamlessly fits into existing Figma workflows

- Provides immediate visual feedback

- Easy to iterate and adjust color scales


Future Development

The plugin is actively maintained with planned improvements:

- Enhanced color information display

- Additional customization options for color ramp generation

- Request feature in comments
plugins.tagline: Generate stunning, perceptually uniform color ramps effortlessly.

plugins.name: Heuristic Checker - BETA
plugins.description:
Heuristic Checker is your design quality companion that automatically analyzes your Figma designs against UI/UX best practices and accessibility guidelines.


Key Features:

• Typography Consistency Check: Ensures consistent font styles, sizes, and line heights across your design system

• Button Consistency Check: Validates button styles, sizes, and states for a cohesive user experience

• Color Contrast Check: Verifies text readability and WCAG compliance

• Design Recommendations: Provides actionable suggestions to improve your design quality


Perfect for:

• Design Teams: Maintain consistency across large design systems

• UI/UX Designers: Catch inconsistencies before they reach development

• Product Managers: Ensure design quality meets project standards

• Developers: Verify design specifications before implementation


Start using Heuristic Checker today to streamline your design QA process and deliver pixel-perfect designs with confidence.


Currently Supported Checks (Beta):

1. Typography Consistency

• Line height consistency

• Font family consistency

• Text style consistency across similar elements


2. Button Consistency

• Size and padding verification

• Typography standards for button labels

• Border radius consistency

• Visual hierarchy in button variants


3. Color Contrast

• Text contrast against backgrounds (WCAG compliance)

• Icon contrast verification

• Color accessibility recommendations


Note: More checks and features will be added in future updates. We welcome your feedback and suggestions for additional checks!

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Design with confidence, ship with excellence

117258.name: Heuristic Checker - BETA
117258.description:
Heuristic Checker is your design quality companion that automatically analyzes your Figma designs against UI/UX best practices and accessibility guidelines.


Key Features:

• Typography Consistency Check: Ensures consistent font styles, sizes, and line heights across your design system

• Button Consistency Check: Validates button styles, sizes, and states for a cohesive user experience

• Text style consistency across similar elements

117258.release_notes:
# Heuristic Checker v0.2.0 Release Notes
January 27, 2025

## 🎉 New Features

### Icon Contrast Improvements
- Enhanced icon contrast validation with role-based requirements
- Improved opacity handling for layered icons
- Added support for interactive, informative, and decorative icon roles
- Implemented proper color blending calculations for accurate contrast measurement

### Color Utilities
- Added new color utility functions for precise color manipulation
- Implemented linear RGB color space calculations for accurate blending
- Added support for hex color conversion and contrast ratio calculation

## 🔧 Improvements

### Accessibility Compliance
- Updated contrast ratio calculations to strictly follow WCAG 2.1 guidelines
- Enhanced focus state detection and validation
- Improved disabled state analysis with multiple detection methods
- Added detailed recommendations for accessibility improvements

### Performance Optimization
- Improved state detection algorithm efficiency
- Optimized color calculations for better performance
- Enhanced memory usage in contrast analysis

### User Interface
- Added detailed state analysis reporting
- Improved issue categorization and severity indicators
- Enhanced recommendations display with specific actionable items
- Added support for component-specific analysis results

## 🐛 Bug Fixes
- Fixed TypeScript type definitions for better code reliability
- Resolved issues with color opacity calculations
- Fixed state transition analysis edge cases
- Corrected focus indicator detection accuracy

## 🔜 Coming Soon
- State Contrast Analysis
- Loading state detection
- Progress indicator validation
- System feedback analysis
- Enhanced performance optimizations for large files

## 💡 Tips
- Use the state contrast checker to validate all interactive components
- Pay special attention to focus indicators for better accessibility
- Check icon contrast based on their intended roles (interactive/informative/decorative)
- Review all state transitions to ensure sufficient visual changes

For detailed documentation and usage guidelines, visit our documentation page.

---
Thank you for using Heuristic Checker! We're committed to helping designers create more accessible and usable interfaces.
117258.tagline: Design with confidence, ship with excellence

plugins.name: XAMLIFY
plugins.description:
Keep your design files clean and optimized with this dual-purpose plugin. Automatically remove all invisible elements that clutter your workspace. Plus, quickly flatten your icons into simplified shapes, making them ready for export and implementation.


Key features:


One-click cleanup of all invisible elements

Bulk icon flattening for consistent results

Quickly detach all visible instances on the page with a single action

Maintain your file structure while reducing complexity

Perfect for design system maintenance and file optimization, this plugin saves time by eliminating tedious manual tasks. Whether you're a UI designer, a design system manager, or anyone aiming to keep their Figma files efficient and well-organized, it's the ultimate tool for maintaining clean and streamlined projects.

plugins.name: Absolutely
plugins.description:
This plugin was created to assign keyboard shortcuts to access the absolute positioning property - nothing more. This function is native to Figma and Figma Slides.


To use the plugin, select layer(s) and run your command (Toggle, Apply, Remove).


Note: Absolute position can only be applied to children of auto layout frames.


Setup a shortcut: I use BetterTouchTool to manage my keyboard shortcuts.


Here is an example, since it's very unintuitive:

Keyboard Shortcut > Trigger Menu Bar Menu-Item > Plugins;Saved plugins;Absolutely;Apply


Enjoy!

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Control absolute positioning with a plugin!

To use the plugin, select layer(s) and run your command (Toggle, Apply, Remove).

Setup a shortcut: I use BetterTouchTool to manage my keyboard shortcuts.


Here is an example, since it's very unintuitive:

plugins.description:
A Document create tools (Japanese)

Figmaのコメント機能とは別に、3種類のメモをファイル上に残すことができます。

AutoLayoutなのでメモの文字数に応じてサイズは自動で切り替わります。


使い方はプラグインからFigdocを選択し、使用したいメモを選択すると今見ているところにメモが配置されます。（３つのメモの違いは今のところ色だけです）

plugins.name: Click Depth
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin for creating captivating layered patterns with depth.

Key features:


Seamless Figma integration: Works directly within your Figma designs

Shape library: Access circles, squares, triangles, and custom polygons

Layer stacking: Build complex patterns with up to 10+ customizable layers

Depth control: Adjust layer count and spacing for varied depth effects

Color picker integration: Use Figma's color tools for precise gradients

Transform options: Resize, rotate, and position shapes within Figma's interface

Blending mode support: Utilize Figma's blending capabilities between layers

Vector output: Generate scalable vector patterns for any project size


Enhance your Figma designs with:


Hypnotic backgrounds for UI/UX projects

Unique illustrations and abstract art

Eye-catching logo elements and brand visuals

Custom UI components with depth


Ideal for UI/UX designers, graphic artists, and Figma enthusiasts looking to add dimension and visual interest to their projects quickly and easily."
plugins.tagline: Layer by layer

95685.name: Click Depth
95685.description:
A Figma plugin for creating captivating layered patterns with depth.

Key features:


Seamless Figma integration: Works directly within your Figma designs

Shape library: Access circles, squares, triangles, and custom polygons

Layer stacking: Build complex patterns with up to 10+ customizable layers

Depth control: Adjust layer count and spacing for varied depth effects

Color picker integration: Use Figma's color tools for precise gradients

Transform options: Resize, rotate, and position shapes within Figma's interface

Blending mode support: Utilize Figma's blending capabilities between layers

Vector output: Generate scalable vector patterns for any project size


Enhance your Figma designs with:


Hypnotic backgrounds for UI/UX projects

Unique illustrations and abstract art

Eye-catching logo elements and brand visuals

Custom UI components with depth


Ideal for UI/UX designers, graphic artists, and Figma enthusiasts looking to add dimension and visual interest to their projects quickly and easily."

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs to access multiple external resources for SVG generation and updates.

plugins.name: cmd-fill
plugins.description:
cmd your workflow

cmd-fill gives you a collection of menu-driven, fill-related controls to supercharge your workflow.


The aim of this plugin is to save you time by surfacing those super-common, mouse-driven tasks - and provide access to them via the plugin menu.


Using your favorite keyboard shortcut or macro tool, assign any of these actions as shortcuts for the ultimate productivity boost.


cmd-fill features

Along with basic features around adding and removing fills, strokes, effects, and export settings, cmd-fill empowers you with features like:

  • Gradient mirroring and directionality (including 45° angles)
  • Image scale mode control (Fill, Fit, Crop, Tile)
  • Copy color values across color modes (CSS, RGB, HSL, HSB)
  • Directly apply strokes to specific edges
  • Invert colors (including linear gradients)
  • Flatten layer fills to create a single new hex value
  • Dynamic black & white color (changes based on background)
  • Invisible-yet-selectable hitbox fill


Check out more on each feature below, along with conditions to help you know how they can be used. cmd-fill has fairly robust error notifications, which should help direct you to issues and how to work through them.


---

features & conditions


Add Fill

Add a white, black, gradient, image, dynamic black, or hitbox fill to selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Gradient will pick up any current fill colors, if any
  • Dynamic fill changes between black and white depending on it’s background color
  • Hitbox is invisible, but allows you to select the layer using cmd + click


Remove Fill

Remove all fills from selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers


Invert Fill Color

Inverts the fill color, where light becomes dark and vice versa and colors change to their compliment.

  • Use on one or more layers with a single fill
  • Supports linear gradients with transparent or opaque stops


Flatten Fill Color

Replaces two fills with a single fill using the flattened hex value of the previous two fills.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Layer must use two fills
  • Top fill must use transparency, bottom fill must be fully opaque
  • Works on linear gradients if all stops are fully opaque


Copy Fill Value

Copy the specified color mode value of a layer to the clipboard.

  • Use on a single layer with a single fill


Copy Flattened Hex

Copies the flattened hex value of the previous two fills to the clipboard, retaining the current fills of the layer.

  • Use on a single layer
  • Layer must use two fills
  • Top fill must use transparency, bottom fill must be fully opaque
  • Does not support gradients


Mirror Gradient

Reversed the gradient color stops.

  • Use on one or more layers with linear gradients
  • Layer must have only one gradient fill


Gradient Orientation

Orient gradients in any direction you choose.

  • Use on one or more layers with linear gradients
  • Layer must have only one fill


Image Mode

Change the image scale mode for selected images.

  • Use on one or more layers with an image fill


Add Stroke

Add black or dynamic stroke to all or specified edges of selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Replaces existing stroke color and weight


Modify Stroke

Applies the stroke to the specified edges or alignment positions.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • Maintains existing stroke color and weight


Remove Stokes

Remove all strokes from selected layers.

  • Use on one or more layers


Layer Effects

Apply effects to selected layers, adding to any existing effects.

  • Use on one or more layers


Layer Export

Apply export settings to selected layers, replacing any existing settings.

  • Use on one or more layers
  • iOS & Android will add multiple export scales according to platform


Notes

cmd + fill will ignore and in many cases remove fills which have been set to hidden

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: cmd-fill gives you a collection of menu-driven, fill-related controls to supercharge your workflow!

plugins.name: Lindi - The AI Designer
plugins.description:
Lindi revolutionizes the way UI/UX designs are created by leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to automate and enhance the design process. Users can rapidly prototype, iterate, and finalize visually appealing and user-friendly UI/UX designs.


The Plugin generates and transfers ready made designs from Lindi - The AI Designer to Figma allowing designers to view, create, and modify the contents of the files in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Design Smarter, Build Faster: Empowering UI/UX with AI precision to streamline your creative process

plugins.name: CSS Generator
plugins.description:
CSS Generator for Figma: Transform Designs into CSS Code

Effortlessly convert Figma designs to clean, developer-ready CSS code with one click. Export UI elements as optimized CSS styles, HTML, or text, and download assets in PNG, SVG, or JPG. Customize CSS properties like class names, flexbox layouts, width, height, and line-height for responsive designs. Perfect for designers streamlining handoffs and developers crafting pixel-perfect, responsive web layouts. Save time and enhance collaboration with semantic, reusable code.


Key Features:

  1. Instant CSS code and HTML generation
  2. Export assets in PNG, SVG, JPG formats
  3. Toggle CSS styles for dimensions, and more
  4. Semantic, responsive properties for web development
  5. Persistent settings for efficient workflows
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma Elements to CSS Instantly

135850.name: CSS Generator
135850.description:
CSS Generator for Figma: Transform Designs into CSS Code

Effortlessly convert Figma designs to clean, developer-ready CSS code with one click. Export UI elements as optimized CSS styles, HTML, or text, and download assets in PNG, SVG, or JPG. Customize CSS properties like class names, flexbox layouts, width, height, and line-height for responsive designs. Perfect for designers streamlining handoffs and developers crafting pixel-perfect, responsive web layouts. Save time and enhance collaboration with semantic, reusable code.


Key Features:

  1. Instant CSS code and HTML generation
  2. Export assets in PNG, SVG, JPG formats
  3. Toggle CSS styles for dimensions, and more
  4. Semantic, responsive properties for web development
  5. Persistent settings for efficient workflows
135850.release_notes: Enhanced performance and efficiency with React.js and optimized rendering.
135850.tagline: Convert Figma Elements to CSS Instantly
